lines.text: I learned that stupid song from a little cat I used to know. I never liked it much... Do you have any fish, Sir? I'm hungry!
His name was Unico. No one knew the reason why, but this little unicorn had a very special power. Wherever he went, Unico had the gift of making all living things lighthearted and happy.
Who dares to disturb my solitude?
Oh, there is someone there! Hello, my name is Unico!
Why should I care what your name is? You must leave this place at once.
Wherever that Unico goes, people start laughing and dancing like complete idiots!
Huh? Why do I have to go?
Because I am the Devil of Solitude, that's why.
Stop it! Young ladies don't catch bugs in their hands!
I know, if you'll be my friend I'll give you anything you want.
It's a deal. Okay, what I want is the horn on your head.
Unico, you can't get away from me! I'll follow you wherever you go!
